required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Patient Satisfaction and Complications With the New Titan® One Touch Release (OTR) Penis Prosthesis
clinical_study.official_title: Patient Satisfaction and Complications With the New Titan® One Touch Release (OTR) Penis Prosthesis

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to assess patient satisfaction with the Titan one touch release penis prosthesis and to register complications with this prosthesis. This will regard the first prostheses inserted at Herlev Hospital/Frederikssund Hospital.
Patient satisfaction will be assessed by mailing out the "Erectile Dysfunction Inventory of Treatment Satisfaction (EDITS) Questionnaire" and recording the patient answers. The most important question will be "Overall how satisfied are you with penile prosthesis?".
Complications (including infection, bleeding, and mechanical failure) will be assessed by a patient chart review and confirmed by a brief phone interview.

primary_outcome.measure: Patient satisfaction assessed by EDITS question 1
primary_outcome.time_frame: Satisfaction will be assessed when questionnaires are returned - expected avarage 2 months
primary_outcome.description: Patient satisfaction assesed by the "Erectile Dysfunction Inventory of Treatment Satisfaction (EDITS) Questionnaire", Question 1: 1. Overall how satisfied are you with penile prosthesis? Very satisfied Somewhat satisfied Neither satisfied or dissatisfied Somewhat dissatisfied Very dissatisfied

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the beginning of study when the chart review is conducted
secondary_outcome.description: Complications may include: Bleeding, Infection, Mechanical problems with the device, Erosion, Pain, Penile shortening, Auto inflation, Other complications. The number and nature of all complications will be noted. Complications are assessed by patient chart review and a brief phone interview with the patient.

secondary_outcome.measure: Patient satisfaction assessed by EDITS questions 2-13
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Satisfaction will be assessed when questionnaires are returned - expected avarage 2 months
secondary_outcome.description: "Erectile Dysfunction Inventory of Treatment Satisfaction (EDITS) Questionnaire" questions 2-13 include questions about: Expectations Continued use of device Ease and frequency of use Confidence Partner satisfaction Erectile function Future surgery Recommendations for others

intervention.intervention_name: Erectile Dysfunction Inventory of Treatment Satisfaction (EDITS) Questionnaire
intervention.description: A questionnaire accessing satisfaction with a penis prosthesis

study_pop.textblock: Men who have had a Titan one touch release penis prosthesis implanted at Herlev Hospital / Frederikssund Hospital.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Men who have had a Titan one touch release penis prosthesis implanted at Herlev Hospital.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Inability to read Danish
